@context.title: @context
@context.description: List of URI to determine the terminology used in the verifiable credential as explained by https://www.w3.org/TR/vc-data-model/#contexts

id.description: URI to the subject of the credential as explained by https://www.w3.org/TR/vc-data-model/#credential-subject

reference.description: Internal reference, usually serial number, of this document

name.description: Human readable name of the credential

type.title: Verifiable Credential Types
type.description: Specific verifiable credential type as explained by https://www.w3.org/TR/vc-data-model/#types

validFrom.description: Date and time when a credential becomes valid.

validUntil.description: Date and time when a credential becomes valid.

id.description: URI when dereferenced, results in a document containing machine-readable information about the issuer that can be used to verify the information expressed in the credential. More information in https://www.w3.org/TR/vc-data-model/#issuer

location.description: Url of the website referencing to document store

name.description: Template name to be use by template renderer to determine the template to use

url.description: URL of a decentralised renderer to render this document

type.description: Proof method name as explained by https://www.w3.org/TR/vc-data-model/#types

filename.description: Name of attachment, with appropriate extensions

type.description: A valid evidence type as explained by https://www.w3.org/TR/vc-data-model/#types
